page.title: 17PETROCKSTOWE LIFESTYLE
page.content: There are some 52 dogs in{Petrockstowe & 105 cats, plus 10 riding horses, a dozen hens, 2 ducks, a goat, goldfish, a budgerigar, a trained buzzard and a ferret. Virtually every home has at least one television & several radios, several have a video, a piano or an electronic organ. One has a computer & several have a microwave or dishwasher Twenty households bake their own bread Half the people visit the village Inn or other local pubs at least weekly, occasionally eat out at restaurants or go to the cinema in Torrington. News- papers are delivered to most homes & post is delivered daily. People have to travel some 6 miles for medical care: to the dentist in Torrington or a doctor there or in Black Torrington. All leisure activities in the village are based at{Baxter Hall,}where the{WI meets, & the badminton club plays.
